desc: Hair Body & Soul Salon & Day Spa

layout.text:
We are pleased to offer online shopping for almost all of the product lines we carry at Hair Body & Soul.
Once you've received your "Ready for Pickup" notification email, you can head up to our front porch, ring the doorbell and let us know you are picking up your online purchase. Business hours are 9-8 Monday through Friday and 8-2 on Saturdays.
Orders can also be shipped directly to you at a cost set by Canada Post.
Thank you for shopping with us. Please reach out if you have any questions!
